name: P2J

He has produced for high-profile pop artists including [[Beyonc√©]], [[Wizkid]], [[Stormzy]], [[FKA Twigs]], [[Burna Boy]], [[Tems (singer)|Tems]], and [[Doja Cat]], among others.
